-1.quotes: a stich in time saves nine

-4.Author: Nelson Mandela
-4.quotes: “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”

-5.Author: Nelson Mandela
-5.quotes: “When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw.

-6.Author: Walt Disney
-6.quotes: “The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

-7.Author: Will Rogers
-7.quotes: “Don't let yesterday take too much of today

-8.Author: Vince Lombardi
-8.quotes: “Its not whether you get knocked down, its whether you get up

-9.Author: Dr. Henry Link
-9.quotes: “We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by actions

-10.Author: John Wooden
-10.quotes: “Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out

-11.Author: Stephen Hawking
-11.quotes: “However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at

-12.Author: Mark Twain
-12.quotes: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started

-13.Author: Kurt Cobain
-13.quotes: “If opportunity doesn't knock, build the door

-14.Author: Albert Einstein
-14.quotes: “In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.

-15.Author: John Wooden
-15.quotes: “Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.

-1100.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
-1100.quotes: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent

-1200.Author: Socrates
-1200.quotes: The only true wisdow is in knowing you know nothing
